issues: High reflectivity on the gold might bake reflections into the texture
Small watermark in bottom right corner (negligible)
all_evaluations.recommendation: Excellent input. The studio lighting, clean background, and clear perspective make this an ideal candidate for high-quality 3D generation.

issues: Extreme side/profile view hides the circular loop structure of the ring
Lack of 3D depth cues due to flat viewing angle
AI may interpret the object as a straight bar rather than a ring
all_evaluations.recommendation: Technical image quality is perfect (lighting, background, sharpness), but the pose is poor for 3D reconstruction. Rotate the ring to a 3/4 view to reveal the band's curvature.

issues: Background color (dark green) is similar to the gemstones, potentially causing segmentation errors
Highly reflective gold and refractive gemstones are physically difficult materials for AI to interpret
Textured surface background is less ideal than a solid neutral color
all_evaluations.recommendation: High suitability due to excellent sharpness and angle. While the background color poses a slight contrast risk with the emeralds, the distinct lighting helps. Expect potential minor geometry artifacts in the gemstones due to transparency.

selection_reason: Excellent input. The studio lighting, clean background, and clear perspective make this an ideal candidate for high-quality 3D generation.
